text: You wake up in a small tenement that was for sale in TUrnip Hill. Your boss is calling you.
You pick up your phone. Your boss is worried about where you live. He says that if you ever want to get back they might have something coming up.

Thank you for playing Infra Text Adventure REBOOTED!
